DOC.brief_summary: To determine Barraquer tonometer provide accurate reliable measurement intraocular pressure . The Barraquer tonometer device use safely painlessly measure intraocular pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Intraocular Pressure Accuracy Variability Barraquer Tonometer
DOC.detailed_description: Intraocular pressure check use four different method tonometry . These four method include Tonopen , Goldmann applanation tonometry , Schiotz tonometry , Barraquer tonometer . The data compare determine reliability accuracy Barraquer tonometer .
